text: ke’ā‘irabochi wede ḫwala lek’eruti belachewi፡- «yebiritu ch’ikanē balebēti wede ẖonu ḥizibochi (wigīya) wede fīti tit’it’eralachihu፡፡ tigadelwachewalachihu፤ weyimi yiselimalu፡፡ bititazezumi ālahi melikami minidani yiset’achiḫwali፡፡ ke’āhuni befīti inide sheshachihu bitisheshumi āsamamīni k’it’ati yik’et’achiḫwali፡፡»
